mapper.select: select od.ord_no, od.mbr_no, od.ord_nm, od.rfnd_bnk_ck, od.rfnd_acct_no, od.rfnd_acct_own_nm, cl.clm_no, #{cnclReqAmt} as cnclReqAmt, py.pay_no, py.pay_mn_cd, py.pay_ccd, py.pay_prgs_scd, py.pay_amt, py.cncl_amt, py.rfnd_avl_amt, py.trsn_id, py.org_pay_no, py.vr_acct, py.vr_acct_nm, py.vr_bnk_cd, py.vr_val_dt, py.vr_val_tt, og.goods_nm from op_ord_base od inner join op_clm_info cl on od.ord_no = cl.ord_no inner join op_pay_info py on od.ord_no = py.ord_no inner join op_goods_info og on od.ord_no = og.ord_no where 1 = 1 and od.ord_no = #{ordNo} and cl.clm_no = #{clmNo} and ( (pay_prgs_scd = '10' and pay_cmt_dtime is null) or (pay_prgs_scd = '20' and pay_cmt_dtime is not null) )
